description: This file contains helper functions for interacting with a Supabase backend, including listing courses with filtering and sorting, fetching individual course details, and enrolling users into courses. It also documents the database schema for related tables.

methods.name: applyILIKEFilter(queryBuilder, columns, q)
methods.description: Builds a filter expression for multiple columns to perform a case-insensitive search using ILIKE, chained with OR conditions.

methods.name: mapSort(sortKey)
methods.description: Maps UI sort keys to corresponding database column and sort direction.

methods.name: listCourses({ q = '', category = '', level = '', sort = 'newest', limit = 24, page = 1 } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of courses from the database, applying optional search query, category, level filters, and sorting options.

methods.name: getCourseById(courseId)
methods.description: Retrieves a single course record by its ID from the database.

methods.name: enrollInCourse(courseId)
methods.description: Enrolls the current authenticated user into a specified course, considering payment feature flag to determine enrollment status.

ctags.signature: ({ q = '', category = '', level = '', sort = 'newest', limit = 24, page = 1 } = {})
